amendment.description: Amendment minimizes NEPA requirements for a geothermal exploration test project so a project can quickly move forward if resources are found.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part A of House Report 112-398 to minimize NEPA requirements for a geothermal exploration test project so a project can quickly move forward if resources are found.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Labrador amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 177 (Roll no. 69).
